    Our Services

    Pressure Washing & Exterior Cleaning Services North West

    From driveway cleaning and pressure washing to roof soft washing and gutter maintenance, R.R.M Exterior Cleaning provides comprehensive exterior cleaning services. Based in Newton-le-Willows, we serve Warrington, St Helens, Widnes, Liverpool, Manchester, Golborne, Huyton, Lymm, Wigan, Skelmersdale, and across Greater Manchester.

    Pressure Washing

    Professional pressure washing for patios, pathways, and hard surfaces. Removes stubborn dirt, moss, algae, and stains with high-powered equipment.

    Pressure Washing

    Driveway Cleaning

    Expert driveway cleaning for block paving, concrete, tarmac, and natural stone. Restore curb appeal and safety with our comprehensive cleaning service.

    Driveway Cleaning

    Roof Cleaning

    Safe and effective roof cleaning using soft wash techniques. Removes moss, lichen, algae, and weathering from tiles and flat roofs.

    Roof Cleaning

    Gutter Cleaning

    Professional gutter cleaning and maintenance. Prevents water damage and extends gutter lifespan with thorough debris removal.

    Gutter Cleaning

    Window Cleaning

    Crystal-clear windows for residential and commercial properties. Pure water technology delivers streak-free results every time.

    Window Cleaning

    Render Cleaning

    Specialist rendered wall cleaning. Safely removes algae growth, pollution stains, and organic discoloration from render surfaces.

    Render Cleaning

    Soft Washing

    Low-pressure chemical cleaning for delicate surfaces including roofs, render, and brickwork. Effective and surface-safe.

    Soft Washing

    Moss Removal

    Professional moss and algae removal from roofs, patios, and outdoor surfaces. Prevents regrowth with preventative treatment.

    Moss Removal
    View All Services
    Why Choose Us

    Your Trusted Local Exterior Cleaning Experts

    At R.R.M External Cleaning Specialist, we combine years of experience with professional equipment and a genuine commitment to customer satisfaction. We understand that your property is an investment, and we treat every job with the care and attention it deserves.

    Free, no-obligation quotes – We assess your needs and provide honest pricing.

    Flexible scheduling – We work around your availability.

    Residential & commercial – From home driveways to business premises.

    Established Since 2016

    Years of experience delivering quality exterior cleaning services to homes and businesses.

    Fully Insured

    Complete public liability insurance for your peace of mind on every job we undertake.

    Professional Standards

    We use industry-leading equipment and techniques for superior, lasting results.

    Satisfaction Guaranteed

    We don't consider a job done until you're completely happy with the outcome.

    Surface-Safe Methods

    Appropriate cleaning methods for each surface type, preventing damage while maximising cleanliness.

    Local & Trusted

    A local business built on recommendations and repeat customers across the region.
